title: Avizo 8.1.1 x64 by Magnitude
description:
Comment: This is not mine or my work, I simply noticed it wasn't around so I found it and am now uploading it. It works, there are no viruses. Enjoy!



Avizo is a 3D analysis software for scientific and industrial data. Wherever three-dimensional imaging data sets need to be processed, in materials science, geosciences or engineering applications, Avizo offers abundant state-of-the-art image data processing, exploration and analysis features within an intuitive workflow and easy-to-use graphical user interface.



Materials Sciences
Avizo is an advanced 3D analysis software application for exploring and understanding materials structures and properties, in a wide range of materials science research areas and for many types of materials (porous media, metals and alloys, fibrous materials, composites, ÃƒÂ¯Ã‚Â¿Ã‚Â½)

Digital Rock Analysis
Avizo is an advanced 3D visualization and analysis software application for exploring and characterizing core samples and digital rock data sets. It offers a comprehensive software platform to run advanced digital routine or special core or core analysis

Electronics
Avizo software provides powerful tools for visualizing and analyzing semiconductor materials data from tomography, microscopy, MRI, and more techniques. From defect/flaw detection and analysis, to performance and process evaluation, and materials characterization.

Industrial Inspection
From defect/flaw detection and analysis, automated in-line or single-part inspection, to performance and process evaluation, and materials characterization, Avizo is used in throughout all the research, design and development phases of materials or products, across a wide range of fields - in aviation and aerospace, automotive, electronics, construction, and manufacturing.

New features and enhancements
-New object popup - module finder with integrated search tool
-Enhanced Animation Producer
-Enhanced Plot Tool and Histogram
-Enhanced Volume Rendering - improved engine, new lighting and effect options
-New Voxelized Rendering
-Enhanced image filters and FFT module
-Accelerated surface generation, new edge-fit option
-New readers for micro/nano-CT and atom probe data
-New scripting convenience commands
-New module for Tridelity auto-stereoscopic displays
-New Tables Panel - Enhanced Crop Editor
-And more...

Install Notes:
1) Unpack & Install
2) check "readme.txt" from "MAGNiTUDE" dir
3) enjoy another fine MAGNiTUDE-release!
